title: Collaborative Instructional Design Project: Applying the CHAMELEON Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A simulated environment where pre-service teachers collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to design actual social studies lessons

learning_goals: Learners can apply the 9 core characteristics of the CHAMELEON framework (communication, humility, flexibility, etc.) to real instructional design scenarios
Learners can develop collaborative strategies considering perspectives of diverse stakeholders (teachers-instructional designers-administrators)
Learners can complete social studies instructional design projects utilizing digital tools in blended learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
